heroIntro: This exceptional 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom penthouse represents the pinnacle of sophisticated coastal living on the Costa Blanca. Located in the prestigious Arenal Bol neighbourhood of Calpe, this exclusive property offers discerning buyers a rare opportunity to acquire premium real estate at remarkable value - priced at €3,399 per square metre, a compelling 20% less than comparable properties in neighbouring Jávea. The 167-square-metre residence showcases sophisticated design and meticulous attention to detail, delivering the quality standards expected by luxury property investors and lifestyle-focused buyers. With eighteen high-resolution images documenting every aspect of this penthouse, potential owners can appreciate the refined finishes and thoughtful specifications throughout. In a market experiencing consistent 7% year-on-year appreciation, this property represents both an exceptional place to call home and a sound investment decision for those seeking Mediterranean elegance combined with proven financial performance.
areaSection: Calpe is an elevated Mediterranean destination perched on the southern Costa Blanca, renowned for its dramatic natural landscape dominated by the iconic Peñón d'Ifach limestone monolith. This enchanting coastal town enjoys approximately 300 days of annual sunshine with mild winters (rarely below 10°C) and warm summers tempered by sea breezes, creating ideal conditions year-round. Positioned between the wealthy enclave of Jávea to the north and the vibrant resort town of Benidorm to the south, Calpe offers a sophisticated balance between resort convenience and authentic Spanish coastal character. The Arenal Bol beach, awarded a prestigious Blue Flag certification, anchors the town's leisure activities with pristine Mediterranean waters ideal for swimming, diving, and water sports.
lifestyleSection: Life in Calpe revolves around an enviable blend of Mediterranean leisure and cosmopolitan convenience. The town hosts a thriving international community, particularly strong among British and German residents, ensuring English is widely spoken and cultural amenities cater to European preferences. Daily living encompasses spectacular beachfront promenades perfect for evening paseos, authentic tapas bars serving local specialities, and sophisticated dining establishments catering to refined palates. The weekly market offers fresh local produce, while contemporary supermarkets (Mercadona, Consum, Lidl) provide international selections. Residents enjoy privileged access to five championship golf courses within 30 minutes, while the upcoming TRAM connection promises enhanced regional connectivity. The expat-friendly atmosphere, combined with excellent healthcare facilities and international schools, makes Calpe exceptionally attractive to families and discerning investors seeking genuine Mediterranean lifestyle with modern infrastructure.
investmentSection: This penthouse represents a compelling investment opportunity within a demonstrably appreciating market. Calpe's property values have increased 7% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader European real estate trends. The 2-bedroom configuration attracts robust rental demand, with comparable properties achieving approximately €1,000 per week during peak seasons - translating to €52,000 annual rental income potential. Positioned 20% below Jávea's premium pricing for equivalent specifications, this property offers exceptional value capture while benefiting from identical market dynamics. The combination of demonstrated capital appreciation, reliable rental yields, and Mediterranean lifestyle appeal positions this penthouse within an increasingly sought investment category. Buyers benefit from Spain's investor-friendly environment, currency diversification advantages, and proven Brexit-independent appeal to international property seekers.
conclusion: This exceptional penthouse represents a rare convergence of sophisticated Mediterranean living, proven investment fundamentals, and compelling value positioning. The combination of premium specification at 20% below equivalent Jávea properties, demonstrated 7% annual appreciation, reliable rental income potential, and exceptional lifestyle amenities creates a compelling proposition for discerning international buyers. Whether seeking a sophisticated coastal residence, investment-grade property, or both, this exclusive penthouse in prestigious Arenal Bol delivers the quality, performance, and lifestyle distinction expected by luxury buyers. healthcare.text: Healthcare in Calpe meets international standards with multiple facilities catering to English-speaking residents. The Centro de Salud Calp provides primary care services, while Hospital de Dénia (30 minutes) offers comprehensive secondary care including emergency departments and specialised services. Private clinics throughout the region employ English-speaking medical professionals familiar with international healthcare expectations. Residents benefit from Spain's efficient healthcare system combined with private options providing rapid appointments and English-language consultations. Prescription medications and specialist care remain exceptionally affordable compared to Northern European standards.
